Patient does not smoke he drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 163 cm, Weight 105.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:54 yr old m inventor presents with 4 months history of Kidney. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 5 years in his past he does not smoke o:Height 163 cm, Weight 104.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Irbesartan - 150 mg daily.
